page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: From statistics aquired from the local council and a survey we discoverd the following information. In the area there are 3479 people and of them about 20% are children, also 18% of the population are pensioners.The average age in the area is about 45 years old.Since 1971 the population has grown by one fith. In the last 15 years about half the population has moved into this area but the residents still do not think the area is over populated.Nearly everyone owns there own house but a minority of people do rent a house. Most people live with one other person in their family. Only 8% of the population are jobless. Three quarters of the adult population own a car.This area has a fairly mobile population.
